function.name: AoAdd
function.summary: Add the interfaces contained in a DLL to the global list of interfaces

function.name: AoAddDirectory
function.summary: Add the interfaces contained in all DLLs in a directory to the global list of interfaces

function.name: AoAddStatic
function.summary: Add a static list of interfaces to the global list of interfaces

function.name: AoAddUnloadSignal
function.summary: Add an unload signal for an addon to an application

function.name: AoGetInterface
function.summary: Retrieve an interface from a control
function.synopsis: #include <aoi.h>\n void *AoGetInterface(const AOICtrl_t *control, const char *name, const int32_t version, const int32_t nth);\n

function.name: AoHold
function.summary: Increment the hold counter for a control

function.name: AoIterate
function.summary: Find a list of controls for an interface name and version
function.synopsis: #include <aoi.h>\n const AOICtrl_t *AoIterate(const char *name, const int32_t version, int32_t * const cookie);\n

function.name: AoIterateHoldGet
function.summary: Search for a specific interface and hold its control
function.synopsis: #include <aoi.h>\n const AOICtrl_t *AoIterateHoldGet(const char *name, const int32_t version, int32_t *cookie, void **interface);\n

function.name: AoRelease
function.summary: Decrement the hold counter for a control

function.name: AoRemove
function.summary: Remove a control from the global list of interfaces

function.name: AoFindExt
function.summary: Find a control with a AOExtInspector interface, and which is best suited for a specific file extension
function.synopsis: #include <aoi.h>\n const AOICtrl_t *AoFindExt(const char *extension, int32_t *rating, const char *interface, int32_t version);\n

function.name: AoFindFormats
function.summary: Find the interface control that can handle a specific media format
function.synopsis: #include <aoi.h>\n const AOICtrl_t *AoFindFormats(const AODataFormat_t *format, int32_t *rating, const char *interface, int32_t version);\n

function.name: AoFindMime
function.summary: Find a control with the best rating for a mimetype
function.synopsis: #include <aoi.h>\n const AOICtrl_t *AoFindMime(const char *mimetype, int32_t *rating, const char *interface, int32_t version);\n

function.name: AoFindName
function.summary: Find a control by its Name interface
function.synopsis: #include <aoi.h>\n const AOICtrl_t *AoFindName(const char *name, const char *interface, int32_t version);\n

function.name: AoFindStreams
function.summary: Find a control with the best rating for a specific stream
function.synopsis: #include <aoi.h>\n const AOICtrl_t *AoFindStreams(AOIStream_t *stream, int32_t *rating, const char *interface, int32_t version);\n

function.name: AoOpenFilespec
function.summary: Finds the first control that can open a file in a given mode
